coding_practice.title: Beautiful Arrangement II
coding_practice.description:
Given two integers n and k, construct a list answer that contains n different positive integers ranging from 1 to n and obeys the following requirement:

Suppose this list is answer = [a1, a2, a3, ... , an], then the list [|a1 - a2|, |a2 - a3|, |a3 - a4|, ... , |an-1 - an|] has exactly k distinct integers.
Return the list answer. If there multiple valid answers, return any of them.

examples.explanation: The [1,2,3] has three different positive integers ranging from 1 to 3, and the [1,1] has exactly 1 distinct integer: 1
The [1,3,2] has three different positive integers ranging from 1 to 3, and the [2,1] has exactly 2 distinct integers: 1 and 2.

coding_practice.explanation:
1. 初始化 left = 1, right = k+1，用於交替生成 k 個不同差值。
2. 前 k+1 個數字交替取 left 和 right，形成 k 個不同差值。
3. 剩下的數字從 k+2 到 n 直接遞增填充，保持連續性且不影響差值集合。
4. 返回生成的列表，即可保證差值集合大小為 k，時間複雜度 O(n)。
